subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Soccer
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: Two soccer clubs want to move into the Olympic Stadium rising in London when the 2012 Games are over and a proposed N.F.L. stadium in Los Angeles could help attract a World Cup.
snippet: Two soccer clubs want to move into the Olympic Stadium rising in London when the 2012 Games are over and a proposed N.F.L. stadium in Los Angeles could help attract a World Cup.
